titles.title: Aircraft Safety and Certification Reform Act of 2020
Aircraft Safety and Certification Reform Act of 2020
Aircraft Safety and Certification Reform Act of 2020
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to reform the Federal Aviation Administration's aircraft certification process, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
